about_the_game:
Clan N is a beat'em up game which combines the classic arcades gameplay with today's modern brawlers. With a pick up and play nature, it's not only easy to play but also hard to master. You have to dodge, block and use your heavy/special attacks wisely to progress. With an ancient far east theme, you'll get challenged across 7 different levels with many different enemies, mid/end level bosses and casual mini games integrated into main gameplay.

Features


  • A fast paced beatemup which combines the classic arcades gameplay with today's modern brawlers.
  • A main story with 7 levels divided into more than 50 sections.
  • Levels contain casual minigames which are tightly integrated into the main story and can be played separately as well.
  • Can be played as local or online coop with up to 4 players.
  • A slick and clean pixel based graphics with accompanying far east inspired music and sfx.

Demo


This (alpha) demo allows you to play a portion of the first level single or with up to 4 of your friends locally. Have fun!

name: Clan N Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz Dual Core Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Fight alone or with your friends, master the art of battle and bring peace back to the land in this arcade inspired epic brawler!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
